creator: vipul_paikane@persistent.co.in
text:
JMeter needs to be able to handle video streaming using RTMP

eg 'rtmp://[ip]/ef08a79dce37.flv'

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
It's not (yet) clear whether the RMTP specification license is compatible with the ASF license.  This is a pre-requisite for any implementation by the ASF.

Likewise, JMeter can only depend on a 3rd party implementation if that has a compatible license.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Seems to be out of scope of Core JMeter.
Niche plugin + license issue.
Closing as WONTFIX
